text:
*We are looking for a Talented HubSpot Ecosystem Developer*

We are a US-based Elite HubSpot Partner that develops websites and web applications for clients around the world. Currently, we are experiencing a growth of new business opportunities that will require a HubSpot developer who enjoys challenging projects, solving new problems, and has a keen attention to detail.

Therefore, we are recruiting for talented HubSpot Developers with solid knowledge and understanding in HubL / HubDB and related technologies, but also have strong skills in  HTML, CSS, jQuery, Vanilla JS and NodeJS.

The candidate should have competency to:

• Convert prototypes into fully semantic and 100% responsive websites.
• Create/update custom HubL modules for webpages, landing pages, and emails.
• Create and edit Custom Objects and properties.
• Understand and build HubSpot dynamic pages consuming data from HubDB, CRM objects or data from a third party API’s.
This is a fully remote position. We don't have location preference, however, it is very important for the candidate to be available during normal business hours Pacific Time from 8am to 5pm so we encourage Latin American candidates to apply.

This is an opportunity to work in one of the fastest growing and most diverse HubSpot focused development agencies in the world. We offer steady work, growth opportunities, and a supportive multi-talented team to tackle unique development challenges within one of the quickest growing ecosystems in the world!

If you are the right candidate, please write to <mailto:jafet@campaigncreators.com|jafet@campaigncreators.com> please include your hourly rate.
